abstract: Baseball Roundup; Seattle Mariners defeat Tampa Bay Rays, 1-0; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Felix Hernandez pitched a four-hitter to become the majors’ first eight-game winner and Nelson Cruz hit his 18th game home run in Seattle’s win.

headline.main: Mariners Beat Rays; Bryce Harper Hits His 18th Home Run
headline.print_headline: Mariners Beat Rays; Harper Hits His 18th

snippet: Felix Hernandez pitched a four-hitter to become the majors’ first eight-game winner and Nelson Cruz hit his 18th game home run in Seattle’s win.
